author: smuzaffar
body: After the integration of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31461 we have couple of warnings in gcc 9 build. Following the logic of code at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31461/files#diff-a30c4a7e7b7c0ef805308e09ce88ca4ccf9488123572c17d35579d12399636e7R28-R45 , the fallthrough is on purpose. This PR explicitly adds the fallthrough attribute to silence GCC 9 warnings
title: [GCC9]Add explicit fallthrough attribute to fix gcc9 warnings
